author: pietjepuk
content: The price you quoted is per unit of gas. A "simple" transaction is 21000 gas, and contract calls are more than that.

author: john_89
content: Oh I get it now. Thanks. But this is for every transaction, right? So if I send $500 to someone or $5, it will consume 21000 gas?

author: pietjepuk
content: Yep! The gas represents the costs associated with the work every node on the network has to perform, and this is the same whether you send a little or a lot.
